channel.title: How do you open a .class file
channel.description:
I was wondering how do you open a .class file.
Thank You.

item.title: How do you open a .class file
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“filth scape, post:1, topic:256898”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=339237.msg2631027#msg2631027 date=1232166450]
Unless you open the class file in a decompiler, then it’ll be called ‘opening’ a class file. Opening a class file in notepad etc is 100% useless.
[/quote]
Technically we’re both right :). I’d say he meant decompile because opening a class file in notepad or anything else like that is useless.

He asked how to open, not decompile.

If that’s what he meant, it’s his fault for not saying ‘decompile’.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you open a .class file

item.title: How do you open a .class file
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:6, topic:256879”][quote author=360236 link=topic=339237.msg2630952#msg2630952 date=1232161754]

Lol It’s simple really. no offence but you must not be very smart if you dont know how to do that. All you need to do is open up notepad or wordpad or what ever you have and drag the .class file into the notepad/wordpad and it should bring up the code thats in there your welcome btw you can’t do much with a .class file its the .java files that you want to edit.

Actually I already did that, I was just seeing if there is a program that did it for the future. I mean not to be rude by why do you act like your smart? Asking questions make you smarter. If I didn’t ask this question I would never no simple as that. So when you ask a question it means you don’t no, so scents 'I am dumb and you are smart" don’t ask any questions?
[/quote]
…no he is right, you open it with notepad.[/quote]
No…

*.class files;

Tree:

Decompiler.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you open a .class file

If I didn’t ask this question I would never no simple as that. So when you ask a question it means you don’t no, so scents 'I am dumb and you are smart" don’t ask any questions?[/quote]
